#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define arrmax 100000
using namespace std;


void fastin(long long int &x)
{
	register long long int a=gc();
	x=0;
	for(;a<48 || a>57;a=gc());
	for(;a>47 && a<58;a=gc())
		x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+a-48;	
}

long long int fact(long long int N, long long int k){
	long long int ans = 1;
	for(long long int i = 1; i <= k; i++){
		ans = (ans * N)%1000000007;
		N--;
	}
	return ans;
};

void anagram(long long int N, long long int k){
	// long long int cmb = fact(N)/fact(N-k);
	// cout << (int)(cmb % (1000000000 + 7))<< endl;
	long long int i, ans = 1;
	ans = fact(N, k);
	cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
  long long int T, N, k;
  fastin(T);
  while(T--){
    fastin(N);
    fastin(k);
    anagram(N,k);
 }
  return 0;
}
